message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $10,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is significantly higher than your offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $7,500?
